thread.title: nice experience and great service
thread.title_full: nice experience and great service - Review of Renaissance Beijing Capital Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: cn-tao
title: nice experience and great service
text:
There are few times been to the chinese restaurant,nice ambiance,love the food especially the service,the manager lisa very friendly and always keep smile, gave warm welcome and right recommendation,the service was outstanding look like she can read our mind,the portion of the food was just enough and tasting was amazing,we just leave the menu and tell her what we want then she create a special menu for us very quickly,and every time she did different but was amazing,we had wonderful experience,my friend with me both enjoyed the meal !thank you and keep it up ! ! !
Room Tip: amazing chinese food and service. See more room tips
